Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{3: 'Noctis is about to throw a punch on the bar counterâ€”but decides against it with a quick glance at his surroundings.'}
{2: 'All property damage will be billed accordingly.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Just how are you even keeping your head so cool...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Well, here's some ice water to get you started.", 3: '9'}
{3: 'Noctis sits on the bar counter and stares at the wine glass, still clenching his teeth in burning rage.'}
{2: "I might not seem like it... but I'm damn mad, too.", 3: '11'}
{3: "Daemon might have been one lousy human being, but that doesn't give anyone the right to just take his life without a proper trial."}
{2: 'But rage aside, I really want to know what Daemon and his people are up to coming to this town...', 3: '13'}
{3: "With his face growing soft and fingers laced, Noctis begins recounting Daemon's last words."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'The guy said they\'d be "spearheading" an attack on the town with some Hetero-Creatures...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Meaning that Daemon and his people aren't operating alone.", 3: '20'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Makes sense! Who sent them here to spearhead the attack, though? That's the million-dollar question here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I\'m guessing it\'s this "Generalissimo" he was talking about...', 3: '22'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'I\'m having trouble seeing where this "Generalissimo" fits in the picture... since Daemon said he belonged to the Forsaken...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Beats me. For all we know, this "Generalissimo" might very well be Nigel.', 3: '24'}
{3: "Unable to reach Babylonia, you have no idea what's happened to the Forsaken or Watanabe..."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Sucks the guy got smoked before we made him spill more beans, though...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What was the poison, though?', 3: '27'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Probably some sort of magnetic substance? That's something Nigel would inject into his targets with his weapons.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Once it's inside the target's body, he can cause a cardiac arrest with it if the target is a human, or paralyze the target's M.I.N.D. if they're a Construct, which kills them eventually... and that's how he manages to smoke his targets even if the attack itself isn't fatal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sounds like one hell of a man...', 3: '31'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "His M.I.N.D. was damaged from modification and that caused him to go blind for good... but that doesn't seem to get in his way at all.", 4: '1'}
{3: "And that's an admirable gift that has turned formidable now that he is no longer a friend."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'But what Daemon said is a little weird if you think about it... I mean, how are they able to control Hetero-Creatures?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Did anything catch your eye when you fought them?', 3: '34'}

{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Well, one thing did strike me as weird... The elephant-like Hetero-Creatures that I fought were pretty docile and weren't super combative. They were super particular about their food, though.", 4: '1'}

{3: "There was this one time when you came across Hetero-Creatures in the forest of a Hetero Zone whose ecology was complicated, and unlike anything you'd seen before... and ecology like that is perhaps susceptible to exploitation."}
{2: 'I guess I\'d describe them as being "led" rather than "controlled."', 3: '38'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Like what I did with them using wheat, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: "And if that's the case, then all you need to do to keep the town safe from an attack now is to either drive the Hetero-Creatures away or bait them into leaving before they get here."}
{3: "If done right, you'll be able to hold the Hetero-Creatures at bay without Babylonia's help."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'We just gotta figure out where they keep those Hetero-Creatures hidden now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Remember those hooligans that...', 3: '46'}

{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Hey, stop judging a book by its cover. I know that's probably what the kids seem like, but they've never done anything morally condemnable, and wreaking havoc on the town is simply out of the question...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Hey, who says I'm talking about those followers of yours?!", 3: '48'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Oh, you mean those underlings that hang around Daemon?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Daemon's hooligans hang around a deserted brewery nearby town, according to one of Noctis' followers."}
{3: "And all the food they bought before the Harvest Festival... is probably what they're using to lead the Hetero-Creatures."}
{2: "There is a good chance that they're operating out of the brewery.", 3: '53'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Well, we know where they are now, so I say we go and bust them!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Looking ready to get the show on the road, Noctis hops off the chair.'}
{2: 'I think we should probably try getting in touch with the mayor before...', 3: '57'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I just tried that... and wasn't able to reach out to him or that snobby son of his.", 4: '1'}
{3: "You're surprised that Noctis tried to reach out to people instead of jumping the gun."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What are you laughing at?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I just find you kind of reliable now.', 3: '62'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "You don't say... but I guess I've grown used to how No. 21 and Vera roll now after spending all this time working with them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "But there is just me now... and you, of course, partner, and I can't help but want to ask... do you think we can really pull this off?", 4: '1'}
{2: "No doubt about that at all. I mean, since we're part of this town now.", 3: '65'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Well, guess I'll pay the brewery a visit on my own, then. They'll have a harder time spotting me that way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'But I want you to promise me this.', 3: '67'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Uhm? Promise you what...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Since you're just there to stop them from attacking the town...", 3: '69'}
{2: "I want you to promise me that you'll avoid confronting them head-on while you're there.", 3: '70'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Right... of course.', 4: '1'}
{2: "And that's if Nigel shows up, too, of course...", 3: '73'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Alright, fine, totally got it. I promise you I'm not going to lay a finger on them even if Nigel shows up...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Noctis' fingers pop a few times as he puts his clenched hand up against his chest. You can tell that he's trying his best not to lose his cool."}
{2: "(Extend your hand out to bump Noctis' fist.)", 3: '78'}
{2: 'I have every faith in you.', 3: '79'}
{3: 'Noctis looks taken aback but quickly nods as he pushes your hand back ever so lightly with his fist. A smile blooms across his face.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'I got this, partner!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'And there is just one more thing...', 3: '84'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '1'}
{3: "You run your eye over Noctis, but he doesn't seem to pick up the hint."}
{2: "Say, don't you think this coating can use some toning down...?"}
